phrases: Open your mind.
Open your mind.
Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
AH! MY GODDESS
AH! MY GODDESS
A snow-white feather comes fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Open your mind.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
Look, you have them, too.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Anyone can be free.
The sky is so blue...
Oh, I did not get a wink of sleep last night.
You cannot sleep?
No...
When I think that you and I are going to share...
Hey, by the way, whenever we cannot sleep, we count sheep...
Did you know that?
So you do have mysterious spells here on Earth as well!
I do not know if you would call it a spell, but maybe it is.
All right, why do not we count sheep together!
Sure, then I will start.
1 sheep.
2 sheep.
3 sheep.
4 sheep.
15 sheep.
16 sheep.
17 sheep.
Are not you getting sleepy yet?
593 sheep!
594 sheep.
We will have counted as many sheep as there are stars in the sky by morning!
Probably...
Now then, let us keep going.
595 sheep.
596 sheep.
597 sheep.
598 sheep...
Man, to think that we are going to start living together under one roof...
I wonder if I can keep up with her.
Is something wrong?
Sighing so early in the morning!
Good morning!
Keiichi!
Good morning.
Ah!
Apprenticeship, Home, and the Goddess
Since there is two of us, I want to get a place with at least two rooms.
But I will have to find something that costs the same as my dorm room.
I do not want to go through the hassle of explaining things to my folks.
I will have to come up with the deficit by doing extra work...
It is hard to get along in this world without money.
I guess so.
You cannot pay rent or eat...
The fact is, without money, you will never get anywhere.
I see.
Then how about a little spell?
Spell?
Here is a wandering soul.
If you can hear my voice, provide this soul with the Light of Life...
Big Brother!
Huh?
It is that little girl...
I cannot thank you enough for helping Hijiri yesterday.
Oh, do not mention it.
Thank you for treating us to lunch.
Hijiri, thank him properly, now.
Hey, Big Sister, are you Big Brother's wife?
I am so sorry!
Look, he is turning red!
He is turning red!
I am not his wife, but a godd...
God?
God, those glasses are so becoming!
Well...
You cannot say things like that in public!
I cannot say such things?
My, how sweet that you two are so close.
You know what?
I have never seen anyone wearing such frilly, flowing clothes...
Are they strange?
Not many people dress like that in this country.
Maybe you stand out a little...
Really?
All right, then...
B-Big Sister!
Is this better, then?
Big Brother!
You cannot use magic in public like that...
Do not worry.
I can only use that kind of power several times a day.
If people find out that you have special powers...
And if that happens, we might not be able to stay together anymore.
If that should come to pass...
Right, so I guess you are going to have to learn all about living in this world.
Yes, apparently so.
Let us try and make this work somehow!
All right!
First of all, we have got to find a new place to live.
Let us go!
Okay!
Uh, we are looking for a place for the two of us.
What kind of place do you have in mind?
A place with a kitchen and two rooms with its own bath and toilet if possible...
I know I am asking for the impossible, but I thought I would ask you to try anyway.
We do not have it!
Oh, man...
Reality is as tough as I thought.
A lot of hardship goes into leading one's life here on Earth, I see...
Yeah, but everyone goes through hardship.
That is why people work hard everyday.
Work hard, did you say?
If you are doing what you love, working hard will not seem like such an effort.
Take me, for instance.
If it is to fulfill my dream of building my own bike...
I find that very appealing, Keiichi!
But the reality is that everything takes money!
Right now this is my entire fortune.
So we have to find a place to live with the help of that'money', is that right?
Yeah.
Then let me ask the Holy Spirit if there is a place for the two of us to live.
Can you do something like that?
We are two wandering souls... two souls who seek a safe abode.
O Spirit of the 2,000-Yen Bill, bearing all the hopes of this man...
Reveal to us now the path you would have us take!
Oh, crap!
My entire fortune!
Let us go after it!
All right!
Let us go after it!
If we do not find it, having no place to live will just be the start of our problems!
Keiichi!
Ah!
My 2,000-yen bill!
Tariki Hongan Temple
Huh?
Jeez, I came this close to losing my entire fortune!
Still, I never knew there was a temple here.
There are no evil spirits here.
It is quite a lovely place!
At any rate, I would better take back my...
Take that!
No!
Keiichi!
Keiichi!
M-My entire fortune...
Huh?
Last I remember, I got totally clobbered over the head by somebody...
You are going to be fine, Keiichi.
No way...
The whole time I was sleeping, my head was on Belldandy's lap?
Are you still in pain?
No, no, I am okay now.
So you woke up.
Oshou!
I am terribly sorry for what I did.
I mistook you for a thief going after the offerings.
Even given my habit of jumping to conclusions, it was a serious mistake!
Oh, no, I should apologize.
What I did was totally misleading!
I am sorry.
Do not give it another thought.
Oh, and...
As for this...
Let me return this money to you.
That is the least I can do.
Uh, could you let us pay for a night's lodging here with that money?
We do not have a place to live, and we have nowhere to go.
If 2,000 yen is not enough, I will do whatever I can to make it up to you.
Please, sir!
That money is your payment for helping me take care of this temple today.
Your food and lodging for tonight will be provided separately.
You are going to enjoy working here.
Get yourselves ready at once!
Yes, sir!
Thank you so much!
Make sure you get every last inch of the floor!
Use your back muscles, already!
It is not that simple!
Take that!
Ow!
You need to follow the girl's example!
Huh?
Ow!
All right, take another lap!
Right!
The image of Buddha is any temple's greatest treasure.
When you have poured your entire heart into...
I can see everything begin to gleam as I polish, more and more.
It is just like I am cleansing my own soul.
But what is this?
What is the matter?
Oh, uh... it is nothing.
That Oshou is one violent guy...
I am sure he means no harm by it.
How are we going to get this temple tidied up?
The lawn's overgrown with weeds.
It will be a major hassle pulling them out!
But if we do it together, we will have fun with it!
Sure, let us just hope we have fun...
Keiichi!
My name is Belldandy...
I call forth to thee in the name of the autumn leaves.
Heed my voice!
Deliver that man into safety!
Keiichi, are you all right?
Was that you... just now?
Yes, but I have broken my promise to you.
I used magic.
But you did not have a choice this time, right?
Besides, you saved me even though it meant breaking your promise...
Thanks,
Belldandy.
Keiichi!
Hey, look, we better fix that roof right away!
I suppose so!
That skill of hers...
That woman...
Who in the world is she?
I was sure she would show her true self at night if she were a specter...
However, I cannot let my guard down.
I have got to keep watch all night.
Well, well...
Reveal yourself, Holy Bell!
Now then, let us sing together!
Restore this desolate land to its former glory!
What!
Do not tell me...
Blunder!
Where on earth is this voice coming from?
Thank you, Holy Bell!
I do not measure up!
That guardian angel, that beautiful voice that could capture anyone's heart...
Everything she does transcends the level of enlightenment I have attained.
I still have a long, long way to go...
This time I got a good night's sleep!
Keiichi!
This time I got a good night's sleep!
It is the Oshou!
Huh?
My Tariki Hongan
Temple, I bid you farewell for a short time.
Oshou!
Where are you going?
I still have a lot of training ahead of me.
I must go on a nationwide pilgrimage so that I can reach full enlightenment!
Please send me off with a smile!
But why, all of a sudden?
I was made painfully aware of my own inexperience.
I must aspire to be like Belldandy...
Guardian angel?
Until that time, I am leaving this temple in your hands.
Farewell!
What did he mean by guardian angel?
I think he must be referring to this...
Whoa!
What is that?
Her name is Holy Bell.
She protects me, and is always with me.
She is my higher self.
So it was the Oshou jumping to conclusions again, huh?
Still, thanks to the Oshou's kindness, we now have a place to live, do not we?
I should fix that hole in the roof...
But is not that one more thing to look forward to, Keiichi?
Morisato Ya
I guess we will have to borrow the Oshou's stuff...
Yes.
I am getting paid tomorrow, so that will take care of whatever else we need, but...
Yes, that is right.
Uh, I think I have put you through a lot of trouble.
Oh, no.
Since we are going through it together, I am enjoying it!
Oh...
What is up?
Look...
You know, if we had pretty cups like these to drink our tea out of...
You like tea, huh?
Yes.
Thanks!
Keiichi?
A moment ago you said we should not waste money, but you just did anyway.
It is just my way of thanking you for saving me yesterday.
But is not it strange?
We went shopping, yet we still have money left over.
Well, since we have more money, we should have bought some tea, too.
And a tea service, too.
When we do, I will make delicious tea everyday!
That will be great!
One day when I woke up...
A day like any other... another one just beginning.
There you are, yawning... your face is still so sleepy.
Because each peaceful day we share is a miracle to me.
This is where my heart will always return...
Forever...
There is only one thing I wish for.
I chase after the same dream, wherever it may go.
The love I feel for you gives me strength.
May tomorrow be as joyful as today...
That is my wish...
The Queen, one who reigns at the highest level of the universe...
The sparks are sure to fly when these two meet.
Next episode: Ah! The Queen and the Goddess!
Do you really have to come to blows over this'Campus Queen' title?
